about_the_game:
Devin Night Token Pack 152: Deadly Draconians

Deadly Draconians, a race of humanoid dragons are poised to descend into your campaign! This pack contains 24 tokens with various weapons, from mighty flamberges, enchanted staves, and magical maces, to traditional sword and board style melee choices, you're sure to find a foe fit to face your most fearsome heroes!
This token pack includes:
  • Draconian_Brass_0
  • Draconian_Brass
  • Draconian_Brass_Spearman
  • Draconian_Brass_Stone
  • Draconian_Brass1
  • Draconian_Brass1_Stone
  • Draconian_Brass2
  • Draconian_Brass2_Stone
  • Draconian_Brass4
  • Draconian_Bronze
  • Draconian_Bronze1
  • Draconian_Bronze2
  • Draconian_copper
  • Draconian_copper1
  • Draconian_copper2
  • Draconian_Gold_0
  • Draconian_Gold
  • Draconian_Gold2
  • Draconian_Gold3
  • Draconian_Hooded_2
  • Draconian_Hooded
  • Draconian_Silver
  • Draconian_Silver2
  • Draconian_Silver3
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: James Holloway

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.6.8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz processor or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9.0 compatible video adapter
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: A sound card is required for voice communication using external programs like Google Hangouts, Skype or Discord.
  • Additional Notes: This product uses a wine wrapper to simplify installation

  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
